title: Almost Married: A Novel about Love, Longing, and Last Hurrahs
description: 28-year-old copywriter Karen has finally found bliss in the arms of a new boy, Bert Reyno, the very same one who stepped into her life when ex-flame Miko the Cheat stepped out. Will the fun last all the way to the altar, or is it doomed to lose steam on the race down the aisle?
author: Tara F.T. Sering
